Up.Statement: -- カラムが無ければ追加を実行 IF not exists (select * from sysobjects inner join syscolumns on sysobjects.id = syscolumns.id where sysobjects.type = 'u' and sysobjects.name = 'w2_OrderItem' and syscolumns.name = 'cooperation_id1') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderItem ADD [cooperation_id1] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END IF not exists (select * from sysobjects inner join syscolumns on sysobjects.id = syscolumns.id where sysobjects.type = 'u' and sysobjects.name = 'w2_OrderItem' and syscolumns.name = 'cooperation_id2') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderItem ADD [cooperation_id2] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END IF not exists (select * from sysobjects inner join syscolumns on sysobjects.id = syscolumns.id where sysobjects.type = 'u' and sysobjects.name = 'w2_OrderItem' and syscolumns.name = 'cooperation_id3') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderItem ADD [cooperation_id3] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END IF not exists (select * from sysobjects inner join syscolumns on sysobjects.id = syscolumns.id where sysobjects.type = 'u' and sysobjects.name = 'w2_OrderItem' and syscolumns.name = 'cooperation_id4') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderItem ADD [cooperation_id4] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END IF not exists (select * from sysobjects inner join syscolumns on sysobjects.id = syscolumns.id where sysobjects.type = 'u' and sysobjects.name = 'w2_OrderItem' and syscolumns.name = 'cooperation_id5') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderItem ADD [cooperation_id5] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''); END GO
